title: Riot screwed up ranked
body:
Hello Summoners!

I want to know what happened this season because my friend named DallasNZ got to silver 5 after winning 4 games.My other friend Xx420blazikenxX got silver 4 after winning 5 games but the big issue is that my mutual friend named theunbeatble2 won 7/10 games and got bronze 3.So thing is i am quite annoyed at the fact that the first two people i mentioned may be my friends but they don't deserve silver.Dallas is so bad on a good game he goes 2/12. Blaziken is ok but he can ONLY play TOP and Jungle and only three champions which are Nasus,Cho'Gath and Sejuani.I'm not trying to be jealous by saying I deserve silver i know im bad but at least i try.I only mentioned 3 out of 8 people who got straight boosted to Silver after winning like 0-5 games on average in ranked.

Explanation Please? Ranked is about the climb.Bronze being the foundation and Challenger being the finish line.Everyone is getting thrown into silver like bronze is too full.

replies.body:
"waa waa bitch bitch how does Ranked work?"

Seriously can people who make these posts go see how ranked works and then not make these shitty posts?

Hint: your friend who won 7/10, was bronze last season after winning 1 game, out of a grand total of 12.

So you don't feel bad, bronze 1-2 is essentially silver 5-4, just keep playing with a positive mindset and try your best to perform. (when I say perform I don't mean making stupid plays in an attempt to go 15/0)

silver 5 is worse than bronze 5. i got into s5 a while ago, got into s4 then went on tilt and havnt been able to get out since. when people say bronze is shit. JUST WAIT TIL S5 WHEN UR IN A PROMO GAME YOUR TEAM SCREAMS TIME TO FEED. ranked silver SUCKS WAY MORE compared to bronze. u should be glad ur not in silver. its bloody awful
A lot of people are silver 5....a lot...Silver and Bronze are the same thing and players have the same skill level, it's not that big a deal.

Except in bronze 5 no one knows basic mechanics.

In silver 5 at least half of them know basic mechanics.

not even diamond people know basic mechanics m8 "Wtf dragon is more important than 2 cs I didn't know" "whoa entire enemy team is alive and ahead and baron is warded, let's try do baron to give enemy a penta" ~ team
